start_boss.text: If only the delegates could see this.
Some real money to be made here, see.

retreat.text: Report to uppers, or just get Tech-Duinn on a line.
That's what you get for half-assing it, see.

need_help.text: We just leave if they shoot us, see?

pursuing.text: No way anyone's taking this money from me, see.

running.text: Duinn got no patience for these jokesters.

hull_90.text: A bit of our ship? A bit of theirs.

overload.text: We need them Tach-Jacks to fix this when we get back.

death.text: On my way back to Duinn, see. *Shuttle leaving bay*

victory.text: Break up the fancy ones see, the Tach-Jacks will want 'em.
Get word to Duinn, more material inbound.
This is how it's done, see.
Time to rake in the money, see.
